alert.note: Alert for Lowlands of the Bootheel; Southwest Desert, Lower Gila River Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 9:39PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Hidalgo County through 1100 PM MDT... At 935 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cotton City, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Blowing dust could reduce visibilities to less than 3 miles along the I-10 corridor Lordsburg to the Arizona state line. Locations impacted include... Lordsburg, Cotton City, Steins, Road Forks, Lordsburg Playa, Granite Gap, Shakespeare and Pyramid Mountains. This includes Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 1 and 24. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lowlands of the Bootheel; Southwest Desert, Lower Gila River Valley
